alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 4:58PM MST until August 23 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 545 PM MST. * At 457 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Metro Center, or near Glendale, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Surprise, Avondale, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Sun City, Waddell, Cashion, Litchfield Park, Glendale Sports Complex, Piestewa Peak Park, Luke AFB and North Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 130 and 141. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 202 and 217. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 5 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
